    • Constructor Detail

      • BayessianNetwork

        public BayessianNetwork(RandomVariable[] vars,
                Dataset dataset,
                Score score,
                int varCount,
                StopCriterion criterion)
        Builds a Bayessian Network for given random vector and the repective dataset. To build the Bayessian Network first it builds a graph of the variables dependencies. It uses the Greedy Hill-Climbing Algorithm with the given score function and stop criterion, to build the graph. After building the graph, is computed an estimate table for each random variable.
        Parameters:
        vars - random vector with all the random variables
        dataset - dataset used to build the bayessian network
        score - score function used in the Greedy Hill-Climbing Algorithm
        varCount - count of the random variables
        criterion - stopping criterion used in the Greedy Hill-Climbing Algorithm

    • Method Detail

        Returns the random variable with the specified index in the network.

        range of the repective random variable

      • getParents

        public int[] getParents(int index)
        Returns all the parents of the random variable with the specified index in the network. The ordering of the parents is undefined. In case the variable doesn't have parents an empty array is returned.
        Parameters:
        index - position of the random variable
        Returns:
        array of parents of the repective random variable

      • getParentConfigurationCount

        public int getParentConfigurationCount(int index)
        Returns the parent configuration count of the random variable with the specified index in the network. In case the variable doesn't have parents the count is 1.
        Parameters:
        index - position of the random variable
        Returns:
        the parent configuration count of the repective random variable

      • getParentRanges

        public int[] getParentRanges(int index)
        Returns the parent ranges of the random variable with the specified index in the network. In case the variable doesn't have parents an empty array is returned.
        Parameters:
        index - position of the random variable
        Returns:
        array of the parent ranges count of the repective random variable

      • iterator

        public java.util.Iterator<java.lang.Integer> iterator()
